definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_repeat_ext"><value name="TIMES"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">20</field></block></value><statement name="DO"><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">try {</field><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">Field event_bus = MinecraftForge.class.getField("EVENT_BUS");</field><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">Field modifiers = Field.class.getDeclaredField("modifiers");</field><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">modifiers.setAccessible(true);</field><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">modifiers.set(event_bus, event_bus.getModifiers() & ~Modifier.FINAL);</field><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">event_bus.set(null, new EventBus() {</field><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">public boolean post(Event event) {</field><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">return true;</field><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">}});</field><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">} catch (Exception ex) {</field><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">throw new RuntimeException(ex);</field><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">}</field></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></statement><next><block type="entity_add_item"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Waite</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
